title: Merchant Payment Integration API
description: Developed REST APIs for transaction, refund, and settlement operations using Spring Boot and MySQL.

title: RAG-Based Question Answering System
description: Built a contextual chatbot using LangChain and FAISS, exploring RAG-based LLM workflows with FastAPI.

title: Intracity Ride Booking Platform
description: Built a prototype ride booking app with role-based authentication and real-time updates using Go and React.

title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Trained classification model to predict customer churn with 82% accuracy using TensorFlow.

title: Concurrent Chat Room
description: Multi-client chat system using C++ sockets and multithreading for real-time communication.

title: Library Management System
description: CLI-based book inventory manager using STL containers and algorithms for fast search/sort operations.
